titles.title: Recognizing the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that an Idaho Potato Month should be established.
Recognizing the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that an Idaho Potato Month should be established.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that an Idaho Potato Month should be established.
